name: Hidden Object Games Free: Mysterious Magician
name_original: Hidden Object Games Free: Mysterious Magician
description:
Mysterious Magician Hidden Objects and find the difference game is another type of new hidden object game.

Start playing the most exciting hidden object game with the most beautiful and dramatic theme! There are many hidden picture games but there are only a few that can offer exciting and varied gameplay with endless hours of fun.

It’s the time to use your observing skills to discover the “hidden objects” and “find the differences” in this game. If you are facing difficulties in spot all the differences you can use hints.

You can play Mysterious Magician Hidden Objects for free. Find all unique objects and 2000 beautifully crafted levels!

Features of Hidden Objects: Mysterious Magician: –

– Mind-blowing levels to play hidden object free!
– Each level has 4 mind-teasing sublevels!
– Win at least 3 stars to unlock the next level!
– More than 10000 hidden objects to find in the mystic quiet place!
– Multiple levels with mystery places full of hidden objects!
– Magnificent graphics & catchy sounds!
– Free of charge! No Internet connection required!
– Zoom in the picture to find the objects!

Discover more secrets hidden in this game as you play! Finish all the levels and solve the mystery of the hidden items. The best strategy to find all the objects required is to use your sharp eyes to look for the largest objects first and use hints sparingly.

Get ready for Mysterious Magician hidden object mystery adventure while you enjoy many levels and have fun finding hidden objects!
